quest.name: Gnome Ore Heroes
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
A fiery young lad is keen to slay some gnomes.
objectives: Defeat two gnomes and slay the elderly gnome when it appears.
Report to the fiery young lad.

dialogue.name: BOY03513
dialogue.text: Have you seen a gnome before? Everybody hates them because they eat our gems and attack people.

dialogue.name: BOY03513
dialogue.text: I want to go into the mine and fight them. But everyone says I'm too young! What do you think?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: If those things crunch rocks, they'll make short work of you.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Maybe when you're about ten years and a hundred ponzes bigger.

dialogue.name: BOY03513
dialogue.text: I'm not scared of those stupid gnomes! But maybe you're right.

dialogue.name: BOY03513
dialogue.text: Then I'll have to get stronger. I'll smash those gnomes one day!

dialogue.name: BOY03513
dialogue.text: Why don't you show me how it's done? If you can beat that really old and nasty one, I'll be impressed!

dialogue.name: BOY03513
dialogue.text: I want to see how brave you are!

dialogue.name: BOY03513
dialogue.text: I can't wait till I'm big enough to fight them myself!

dialogue.name: FATHER03513
dialogue.text: It seems my boy's been spouting all sorts of nonsense!

dialogue.name: BOY03513
dialogue.text: It was all my idea, though. Thanks to me, the mine's safe!

dialogue.name: FATHER03513
dialogue.text: I'm sorry for the trouble he's put you through. All's well that ends well, I suppose. You've certainly done us miners a favor.

dialogue.name: FATHER03513
dialogue.text: And I'm sure he would've been there beside you if he were older. He just needs to wait till he's strong enough to back up that big mouth of his.

dialogue.name: FATHER03513
dialogue.text: I appreciate you taking the time to listen to him and clear out the mine, though. It's not much, but please accept this as a show of thanks.
